comprehensive_overview: Bohrium is a high-performance JIT-compiled array programming language that extends Python with support for versatile array operations using a subset of the APL syntax. It automatically parallelizes and runs programs on the CPU and GPU.
core_features: 1. Python integration with APL-like array operations. 2. Just-in-time (JIT) compilation for high performance. 3. Automatic parallelization for CPU and GPU execution. 4. Seamless integration with existing Python libraries and tools.
